fruits.title: Apple
fruits.description: Apple is a round fruit with a red, green, or yellow skin and a white or cream-colored interior. It has a sweet taste and is often eaten raw or used in cooking.

fruits.title: Orange
fruits.description: Orange is a round citrus fruit with a thick, orange skin and a juicy, sweet or tart interior. It's rich in vitamin C and often eaten as a snack or used in cooking.

fruits.title: Banana
fruits.description: Banana is a curved tropical fruit with a yellow or green skin that turns yellow when ripe. It has a creamy white flesh and a sweet taste, it is often eaten as a snack or used in baking.

fruits.title: Pineapple
fruits.description: pineapple is tropical, sweet, juicy, rich in vitamins and enzymes, anti-inflammatory, eaten fresh, canned, or cooked. The skin and core are inedible. Used in cocktails, desserts, and savory dishes. Symbol of hospitality.

fruits.title: Mangosteen
fruits.description: Mangosteen is a tropical fruit with a thick, reddish-purple rind and white, juicy flesh. It has a sweet and tangy taste and is rich in antioxidants and vitamins. The fruit is often eaten fresh, but also used in jams, jellies and other preserves. It is considered a delicacy in Southeast Asia.
